whatIsDrinq.title: What is DRINQ
whatIsDrinq.descriptionDesktop: DRINQ™ is an automated vending solution that serves fresh sports supplements such as protein, creatine, and pre-workout in seconds. Unlike traditional smoothie bars or fitness vending machines, we are founded on the principle of providing a modern and effortless way to enjoy supplements, eliminating the time, cost, and complexity of running a bar.
whatIsDrinq.descriptionMobile: DRINQ™ is an automated vending machine that serves fresh supplements like protein, creatine, and pre-workout in seconds — fast, modern, and effortless.

cards.title: For Owners
cards.text: It’s a simple way to enhance member experience and generate extra value with no setup, staff, or ongoing management.

cards.title: For Consumers
cards.text: It’s the easiest way to enjoy high-quality, freshly mixed supplements anytime, right at the gym.

drinqBenefits.title: Partnering with us
list: No cost to install or for partnership.
Modernizes your gym with a smart, hygienic solution.
Generates passive income through revenue sharing.

homeContact.title: Let’s Talk Opportunities
homeContact.subtitle: Reach out anytime. We’re happy to answer your questions and explore how DRINQ™ can bring value to your facility.

getStartedPage.title: Get Started With DRINQ
getStartedPage.subtitle: Getting started with DRINQ™ is simple, fast, and completely managed by our team. From the first meeting to the installation and profit sharing, everything is handled for you — no setup costs, no daily management.

steps.title: Step 1 – Initial Meeting
steps.subtitle: We start with a quick meeting to understand your facility: monthly and daily traffic. This helps us tailor the best solution for your location.

steps.title: Step 2 – Site Evaluation
steps.subtitle: Together, we identify a strategic spot inside your gym usually near high-traffic zones or entrances to ensure maximum visibility and convenience for your members.

steps.title: Step 3 – Agreement & Setup
steps.subtitle: Once the location is confirmed, we finalize the agreement and terms. DRINQ™ then takes care of everything: installation, refills, maintenance, and overall management of the machine.

steps.title: Step 4 – Profit Sharing
steps.subtitle: As part of our partnership, your gym receives a share of the revenues generated along with a detailed sales report.

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.subtitle:
We’d love to hear from you!
Let’s get in touch
contact_us.or_reach: Or reach us out on here

howItStarted.title: How it started
howItStarted.text:
We noticed that many gym owners and fitness facility managers wish to offer their members a premium nutritional experience such as fresh protein shakes but don’t want to deal with the operational costs, management, or logistics of running a smoothie or supplement bar.
That’s where DRINQ comes in. We handle everything from installation and operation to restocking and maintenance allowing gyms to offer a modern, convenient, and profitable amenity without any effort on their part. Our vending machines deliver freshly mixed, high-quality supplements with great variety and speed, elevating both the gym’s brand image and the member experience.

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.text: Distribution DRINQ Inc., also called DRINQ™, is a corporation specializing in automated sport supplement vending solutions. From services to cost, everything is handled by us, giving your sport facility the convenience and innovation it deserves.

imgWTitle2.title: Brand Mission
imgWTitle2.text: Our mission is to enhance the value and experience of fitness centers by providing a simple, high-quality, and fully managed solution for on-demand protein shakes and sports supplements.

advertiseDrinq.title: Advertise with DRINQ
advertiseDrinq.text: Reach your audience where it matters most inside the gym. Our automated machines feature large digital screens located in high-traffic fitness centers, offering brands a powerful and cost-effective way to reach active consumers.
